mapper.select: SELECT total_plan_code AS planCode , user_email AS userEmail , all_plan_title AS planTitle , all_plan_contents AS planContents , all_plan_start_date AS startDate , all_plan_end_date AS endDate , all_plan_register_date AS registerDate , all_plan_degree AS planDegree , all_plan_division AS totalPlanDivision , all_plan_status AS planStatus , all_plan_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason FROM ypr821.total_plan WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_educational_history_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_educational_title AS planTitle , plan_educational_choice , plan_educational_school , plan_educational_department , plan_educational_credit , plan_educational_contents AS planContents , plan_educational_start_date AS startDate , plan_educational_end_date AS endDate , plan_educational_degree AS planDegree , plan_educational_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_educational_status AS planStatus , plan_educational_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_educational_history WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_project_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_project_title AS planTitle , plan_project_name AS planName , plan_project_contents AS planContents , plan_project_start_date AS startDate , plan_project_end_date AS endDate , plan_project_development_environment , plan_project_url , plan_project_degree AS planDegree , plan_project_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_project_status AS planStatus , plan_project_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_project WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_certificate_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_certificate_title AS planTitle , plan_certificate_name AS planName , plan_certificate_contents AS planContents , plan_certificate_start_date AS startDate , plan_certificate_end_date AS endDate , plan_certificate_degree AS planDegree , plan_certificate_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_certificate_status AS planStatus , plan_certificate_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_certificate WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_certified_language_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_certified_language_title AS planTitle , plan_certified_language_name AS planName , plan_certified_language_test_name , plan_certified_language_test_date , plan_certified_language_score , plan_certified_language_contents AS planContents , plan_certified_language_test_start_date AS startDate , plan_certified_language_test_end_date AS endDate , plan_certified_language_degree AS planDegree , plan_certified_language_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_certified_language_status AS planStatus , plan_certified_language_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_certified_language WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_technology_stack_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_technology_stack_title AS planTitle , plan_technology_name AS planName , plan_technology_stack_contents AS planContents , plan_technology_stack_start_date AS startDate , plan_technology_stack_end_date AS endDate , plan_technology_stack_degree AS planDegree , plan_technology_stack_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_technology_stack_status AS planStatus , plan_technology_stack_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_technology_stack WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_job_training_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_job_training_title AS planTitle , plan_job_training_name AS planName , plan_job_training_academy_name , plan_job_training_cost , plan_job_training_curriculum , plan_job_training_contents AS planContents , plan_job_training_start_date AS startDate , plan_job_training_end_date AS endDate , plan_job_training_degree AS planDegree , plan_job_training_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_job_training_status AS planStatus , plan_job_training_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_job_training WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_internship_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_internship_title AS planTitle , plan_internship_company_name , plan_internship_Internship_period , plan_internship_working_hours , plan_internship_business_contents , plan_internship_activity_goal , plan_internship_contents AS planContents , plan_internship_start_date AS startDate , plan_internship_end_date AS endDate , plan_internship_degree AS planDegree , plan_internship_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_internship_status AS planStatus , plan_internship_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_internship WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_contest_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_contest_title AS planTitle , plan_contest_name AS planName , plan_contest_field , plan_contest_period_start_date , plan_contest_period_end_date , plan_contest_host_organization , plan_contest_topic , plan_contest_contents AS planContents , plan_contest_start_date AS startDate , plan_contest_end_date AS endDate , plan_contest_degree AS planDegree , plan_contest_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_contest_status AS planStatus , plan_contest_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_contest WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};

SELECT plan_career_code AS planCode , total_plan_code AS totalPlanCode , user_email AS userEmail , plan_career_title AS planTitle , plan_career_company_name , plan_career_occupation , plan_career_department , plan_career_position , plan_career_employment_period_start_date , plan_career_employment_period_end_date , plan_career_join_target_date , plan_career_contents AS planContents , plan_career_start_date AS startDate , plan_career_end_date AS endDate , plan_career_degree AS planDegree , plan_career_degree_change_reason AS degreeChangeReason , plan_career_status AS planStatus , plan_career_created_date AS registerDate FROM ypr821.plan_career WHERE ${searchKey} = #{searchValue};
